summary: Five office friends meet up for a night on the town to celebrate the forthcoming marriage of one of them. As the night wears on and the drink starts to tell, they become more confidential ... See full summary Â»
cast: Nancy Marchand|Carolyn Jones|Patricia Smith|Larry Blyden|Philip Abbott|Jack Warden|E.G. Marshall|Don Murray|Barbara Ames|Norma Arden Campbell|Paul Kruger|Judith Malina|Karen Norris|Jeffrey Sayre|Arthur Tovey|Robert B. Williams
title: La noche de los maridos
